title: 2015년 Arthur Starling A/K/A Ricky Starling v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Georgia, GA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Arthur Starling A/K/A Ricky Starling v. State. 판결일: 2015-09-21. 법원: Court of Appeals of Georgia.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Arthur Starling A/K/A Ricky Starling v. State
**판결일**: 2015-09-21
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Georgia
**관할**: Georgia, GA


## 판결문 요약

Court of Appeals
of the State of Georgia

                                        ATLANTA,____________________
                                                  September 10, 2015

The Court of Appeals hereby passes the following order:

A16A0046. ARTHUR STARLING A/K/A RICKY STARLING v. THE STATE.

      Arthur Starling a/k/a Ricky Starling was convicted of malice murder and
numerous other charges. The trial court denied his motion for new trial, and Starling
filed a direct appeal to this Court.
      Under our Constitution, however, the Supreme Court has appellate jurisdiction
over “[a]ll cases in which a sentence of death was imposed or could be imposed.” See
Ga. Const. of 1983, Art. VI, Sec. VI, Par. III (8). Because a penalty of death can be
imposed for the crime of murder, jurisdiction is proper in the Supreme Court. See
OCGA § 17-10-30 (b); Neal v. State, 290 Ga. 563, 572 (722 SE2d 765) (2012)
(Hunstein, J., concurring); see also State v. Thornton, 253 Ga. 524 (322 SE2d 711)
(1984) (directing this Court to transfer “all cases in which either a sentence of death
or of life imprisonment has been imposed upon conviction of murder”). Accordingly,
Starling’s appeal is hereby TRANSFERRED to the Supreme Court for disposition.

                                        Court of Appeals of the State of Georgia
                                                                             09/10/2015
                                               Clerk’s Office, Atlanta,______________...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
